item.title: Giants Reportedly Hire Former Chiefs OC Matt Nagy as Offensive Coordinator
item.description: The Giants are reportedly hiring former Chiefs offensive coordinator Matt Nagy as their new offensive coordinator.

item.title: Patriots Owner Robert Kraft Reportedly Fails to Make Pro Football Hall of Fame
item.description: Patriots owner Robert Kraft has reportedly joined former New England head coach Bill Belichick in Hall of Fame rejection.

item.title: Ranking the Seahawks' 12 Most Important Moves to Reach Super Bowl LX
item.description: The Seahawks have been the best team in football for much of this season. We rank their biggest acquisitions en route to the Super Bowl.

item.title: Ranking the Patriots' 12 Most Important Moves to Reach Super Bowl LX
item.description: The Patriots pulled off the NFL's biggest turnaround this season. We rank their biggest acquisitions en route to the Super Bowl.

item.title: Patriots DC Terrell Williams on Being Cancer-Free: 'It's Been Joyous For Me'
item.description: New England Patriots DC Terrell Williams battled prostate cancer, inspiring his team with positive leadership throughout it all.
